name: Honey Chocolate
description: "Milk, coffee, and hazelnuts! Which is your favorite?” They say that on the day of the school sacrifice, Candy Kitty will randomly stuff chocolate into a desk, and the student who receives it will have good luck for a whole year!
effect: Dmg to Shellfish +10%,Dmg Taken from Shellfish -10%

name: Honglyun's Sword [2]
description: A sword made from meteorite and crystals by an eastern country, for the worship of gods.

name: Honglyun's Sword [3]
description: A sword made from meteorite and crystals by an eastern country, for the worship of gods.

name: Horong
description: With it, one doesn't have to be afraid of the darkness anymore!

name: Horong Blueprint
description: With it, one doesn't have to be afraid of the darkness anymore!

name: Hot Black Tea
description: Drink the warm drink stewed over a gentle heat with the special black tea and honey from Mjolnir Mountains and you will recover 1500-2000 HP. The value of recovery is related to VIT. Can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Hot Green Tea
description: The slightly bitter green tea is made of the special green tea leaves on Mjolnir Mountains and the sweetest spring water. Drink it and you will recover 100-150 Sp. Can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Hot Meal
description: A hot pot full of fresh ingredients. The tiny number of spores promotes a moderately spicy taste that keeps your body warm. Stores 600,000 HP and 40,000 SP. Restores 500 HP every 6s when HP is below 70% and 50 SP every 6s when SP is below 40%

name: Hot-blooded Headband
description: The hair band is full of burning heart, determination and will. By wearing it, you will clench your fist unconsciously.

name: Hot-blooded Headband Blueprint
description: The hair band is full of burning heart, determination and will. By wearing it, you will clench your fist unconsciously.

name: Hot-blooded Headband [1]
description: The hair band is full of burning heart, determination and will. By wearing it, you will clench your fist unconsciously.

name: HP Potion
description: Exchange only after completing the Gold Coin Merchant quest. After using, You will recover 150 HP.
